participant_1.background:
I'm trying to spend as much time with my sister and Charlie as possible.
I am not concerned about my appearance in the morning because I have more important things to focus on.
i like all types of music.
My comic book collection was stolen from my apartment when I was away on vacation.
I play the piano, but only at home because caffeine makes my hands shake.

participant_2.background:
My memory of horseback riding last year was so vivid, I can still recall the feeling of the wind in my hair and the smell of the leather saddle.
I like to play outside with my brothers on the Fourth of July.
i really enjoy hiking.
I imagine myself fighting in the arena as mileena.
I spent more time with my wife and comics.

content.text: I like to play the piano, but only at home because caffeine makes my hands shake.
I used to play the piano and I can relate to the caffeine thing, it makes my hands shake too.
I am sorry that you don't play the piano anymore.
No I do still play it, I just don't play it out in public.
That makes sense. I really like playing the piano, it helps me to relax.
What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play all types of music, but I like to play classical music the most.
I love classical music, it is so peaceful.
What is your favorite piece of classical music?
I have a lot of favorite pieces, but one of my favorites is Beethoven's Moonlight Sonata.
That is a beautiful piece of music.
I also like Chopin's Nocturne in E-flat major.
That is a beautiful piece of music too.
